FileEndedEventArgs(MPVEndFileReason, MPVError, long, long, int)

Create args for EndFile event

public FileEndedEventArgs(MPVEndFileReason reason, MPVError error, long playlistEntryId, long playlistInsertId, int playlistInsertNumEntries)

Parameters

reason MPVEndFileReason

File ending reason

error MPVError

Error code for error reason

playlistEntryId long

Playlist entry Id of the file that was being played

playlistInsertId long

Playlist entry Id of first inserted item

playlistInsertNumEntries int

Number of entries in inserted playlist

Properties

Error

Contains error code if reason is MPVEndFileReason.Error, or 0

public MPVError Error { get; init; }

Property Value

MPVError

PlaylistEntryId

Playlist entry Id of the file that was being played

public long PlaylistEntryId { get; init; }

Property Value

long

PlaylistInsertId

If loading ended, because the playlist entry to be played was for example a playlist, and the current playlist entry is replaced with a number of other entries, this will be set to the playlist entry Id of the first inserted entry

public long PlaylistInsertId { get; init; }

Property Value

long

PlaylistInsertNumEntries

If loading ended, because the playlist entry to be played was for example a playlist, and the current playlist entry is replaced with a number of other entries, this will be set to the total number of inserted playlist entries

public int PlaylistInsertNumEntries { get; init; }

Property Value

int

Reason

File ending reason

public MPVEndFileReason Reason { get; init; }

Property Value

MPVEndFileReason
